title: Premium Cigars + Premium Coffee = Premium Winner!
itunes:title: Premium Cigars + Premium Coffee = Premium Winner!
description: Today on The Cigar Authority; Paul Joyal from Joyal's Liquors joins David Garofalo, Mr Jonathan and Chuck Morrison with his legendary roasted coffee and Series J Grotto cigar. Then with 318 podcasts under their belt, and top rankings on iTunes, Bob and Dale from Dog Watch Radio call in to teach The Cigar Authority how to do it right! Finally, we smoke the Weird Al Yankovic of cigars; The Viaje. It's time for finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
